page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content:
THE AREA COVERED BY OUR SURVEY IS BOUNDED BY THE VILLAGE OF {ROCKLANDS} TO THE WEST,{ATTLEBOROUGH }TO THE EAST AND {GREAT ELLINGHAM}TO THE NORTH.
IT IS AN AREA OF RURAL ARABLE FARMLAND CONSISTING MAINLY OF GRAIN AND ROOT CROPS.THERE IS SOME ROUGH PASTURE AND GRAZING LAND.
THE MAJORITY OF THE POPULATION IS CONCENTRATED IN THE VILLAGES OF{GREAT {ELLINGHAM}AND{WESTCAR.}THE REST OF THE AREA IS ISOLATED FARMS.
THERE ARE FEW ROADS IN THE AREA AND MANY OF THEM ARE UNCLASSIFIED.THE NEW ATTLEBOROUGH BYPASS RUNS THROUGH THE S.E. CORNER . THE HOUSES IN THE LESS POPULATED PARTS ARE MAINLY OLD,THE MAJORITY OF THE HOUSES IN THE TWO VILLAGES ARE MODERN.
